it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller

Class TerminatorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller.TerminatorController

  • class TerminatorController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that is dedicated to the actions of the terminator and is correctness.
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void handleFirstRequestAction(ClientEvent message)
      Handles the request to do terminator action by the player.
      (package private) void handleMove(SelectionSquare message)
      Handles the movement of the terminator in the square indicated by the row and column contained in the event received.
      (package private) void handleRequestMove(ClientEvent message)
      Handles the request by the player to move terminator sending an event to choose a square.
      (package private) void handleSpawnOfTerminator(SelectionSquare message)
      Handles the spawn of the terminator putting it on the square chosen by the player of the turn.
      (package private) void handleTerminatorShootAction(ClientEvent message)
      Handles the terminator shoot to the player chosen by the player of the turn.
      (package private) void sendRequestToChoosePlayerToAttack(ClientEvent message)
      Sends the request to the player to choose who the terminator has to attack.

    • Method Detail

      • handleSpawnOfTerminator

        void handleSpawnOfTerminator(SelectionSquare message)
        Handles the spawn of the terminator putting it on the square chosen by the player of the turn.
        Parameters:
        message - Event received by the player of the turn with row and column of the square where he decided to generate the terminator.

      • handleFirstRequestAction

        void handleFirstRequestAction(ClientEvent message)
        Handles the request to do terminator action by the player.
        Parameters:
        message - Event received by the player that decided to do terminator action.

      • handleRequestMove

        void handleRequestMove(ClientEvent message)
        Handles the request by the player to move terminator sending an event to choose a square.
        Parameters:
        message - Event received by player with the choice to move terminator.

      • handleMove

        void handleMove(SelectionSquare message)
        Handles the movement of the terminator in the square indicated by the row and column contained in the event received.
        Parameters:
        message - Event received by client with the row and column of the square where the player wants to move the terminator.

      • sendRequestToChoosePlayerToAttack

        void sendRequestToChoosePlayerToAttack(ClientEvent message)
        Sends the request to the player to choose who the terminator has to attack.
        Parameters:
        message - Event received by client.

      • handleTerminatorShootAction

        void handleTerminatorShootAction(ClientEvent message)
        Handles the terminator shoot to the player chosen by the player of the turn.
        Parameters:
        message - Event received by client with the nickname of the player to choose to be attacked.
